commands.name: az network manager connection subscription create
commands.summary: Create a network manager connection on this subscription.
commands.syntax:
az network manager connection subscription create --connection-name
                                                  --network-manager
                                                  [--description]
examples: az network manager connection subscription create --connection-name "testNetworkManagerConnection" --description "A sample policy" --network-manager-id /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/rg1/providers/Microsoft.Network/networkManagers/testManagerName

commands.name: az network manager connection subscription delete
commands.summary: Delete specified connection created by this subscription.
commands.syntax:
az network manager connection subscription delete [--connection-name]
                                                  [--ids]
                                                  [--subscription]
                                                  [--yes]
examples: az network manager connection subscription delete --connection-name "testNetworkManagerConnection"

commands.name: az network manager connection subscription list
commands.summary: List all network manager connections created by this subscription.
commands.syntax:
az network manager connection subscription list [--max-items]
                                                [--next-token]
                                                [--skip-token]
                                                [--top]
examples: az network manager connection subscription list

commands.name: az network manager connection subscription show
commands.summary: Get a specified connection created by this subscription.
commands.syntax:
az network manager connection subscription show [--connection-name]
                                                [--ids]
                                                [--subscription]
examples: az network manager connection subscription show --connection-name "testNetworkManagerConnection"

commands.name: az network manager connection subscription update
commands.summary: Update a network manager connection on this subscription.
commands.syntax:
az network manager connection subscription update [--add]
                                                  [--connection-name]
                                                  [--description]
                                                  [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--ids]
                                                  [--remove]
                                                  [--set]
                                                  [--subscription]
examples: az network manager connection subscription update --connection-name "testNetworkManagerConnection" --description "A sample policy"
